name: Peace of Eldath: Clockers Descent
description:
In this game you follow clocker as he traverses the depths of the castle, fighting of creatures and critters, in search of the collector of skulls. 

Group name-Peace of Eldath

How to play

A-D to move Left-Right

 Space to Jump

 J/Mouse 1 for Sword Attack 

K/Mouse 2 for Fall Attack(mid air)

(when using this on an enemy hold space to jump higher)

Roughly every 10 seconds your health will be slightly restored

Good luck!
